      static class  WebClientContext.StoredResponses

      • getResponses

        public WebClientContext.StoredResponses getResponses()
        Gets the current responses (currentResponse and previousResponse) of the context to be able to restore them later.

        MG: may probably be problematic (like previousResponse) when windows have been closed

        Returns:
        the status

      • restoreResponses

        public void restoreResponses(WebClientContext.StoredResponses savedResponses)
        Restore the responses to a previously saved value.
        Parameters:
        savedResponses - the responses to restore

        public com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.Page getCurrentResponse()

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        StepExecutionException - if the current response isn't an html page

        public void saveResponseAsCurrent(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.Page page)
        Sets the current and previous response for this context and this step.
        Parameters:
        page - The page to become the current response.

      • saveResponseAsCurrent

        protected void saveResponseAsCurrent(com.canoo.webtest.engine.WebClientContext.StoredResponse current)
        Sets the current and previous response for this context and this step with the associated files (if any)
        Parameters:
        current - The future current response.

      • getCurrentForm

        public com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlForm getCurrentForm()
        Gets the current form in the current response. This is the one that has been selected by setting the last form field.
        Returns:
        null if no current form available

      • setCurrentForm

        public void setCurrentForm(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlForm form)
        Sets the form that has to be used as the default one for setting fields.
        Parameters:
        form - new current form or if null then set current form to none (reset)

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Closes the WebClient. This ensures that running js scripts are stopped. This instance should be used once this method has been called.
